17351.name: Print on Demand Automator
17351.description: Do you find yourself spending hours doing repetitive steps just to create print on demand designs? If so, this Figma plugin can give your precious time back. Create a design template with variables. Submit a CSV file. The plugin will replace the variables with the text supplied by your CSV file.

19334.name: Figdoc
19334.description:
Create a document on Figma using the Markdown.


⚠️NOTE

Figdoc supports:

  • Heading ✔
  • Paragraph ✔
  • Unordered list ✔
  • Ordered list ✔
  • Strong ▲
  • Emphasis ▲
  • Hyperlink ✕
  • Table ✕
  • Code ✕
  • Blockquote ✕

19632.name: Toukan
19632.description:
A simple and intuitive tool to generate design tokens based on Figma design system in one click.


Copy and use this page from community file as boiler plate:

https://www.figma.com/file/aZL0Y2Xy2gZKpMFtbhqvjU/Toukan?node-id=0%3A1


Don't forget to give your feedback! :)

16400.name: Eliq Json Parser
16400.description:
Parses some stuff for eliq :).

Don't use this.
16400.release_notes: New way of handling color styles

15818.name: ToAtem
15818.description: Atem Switcher にPNGを送るプラグイン

19170.name: Aco Reader
19170.description: Sometimes you need to reuse your prebuild color palette with extension ACO(.aco) that you've on your another APP, but currently on Figma doesn't provide this thing. This plugin provide you to easily convert .aco file to color palette.

19163.name: Indexer
19163.description:
You can make Indexes with links to frames and page in a file using Indexer.


Features:

  1. Make a list of all the pages in a file(with links).
  2. Make a list of all the frames in a file(with links).
  3. Make a list of all frames in a page(with links).
  4. Make a list of selected frames in a page(with links).
  5. Make a list of set of frames which have specific width or height in a page(with links).


Leave a comment if you have any suggestions or feedback.

19051.name: Straple Text Style Manager
19051.description: Text style manager allows you to update your global text styles all at once rather than individually, so if you have any type hierarchy then you no longer need to update each font individually.

19209.name: Export Variants
19209.description:
Easily export your variants to SVG.


Figma variants are neat however they can be frustrating to export since you can't control the naming scheme. This plugin lets you export your variants in two key ways: folders and file names.


Folders

Variant names are used for each folder letting you combine component sets together.


File names

A flat, simple approach that creates helpful filenames based on each variant name.


Note

When using a boolean variant the property name will be used for the "true" or "on" state while variants with "off" or "false" states will have the property omitted.

19287.name: Tabletop Tools
19287.description: A small set of tools to help tabletop games designers prototyping new ideas!

19127.name: Wantedly Preflight
19127.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ― You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ― Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ― Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

19411.name: trackingBlip
19411.description: Plugin para facilitar a criação de trackings

18603.name: BRiX Fusion
18603.description: The BRiX Fusion plugin allows you to push your design assets from Figma to HubSpot and vice-versa.
